allowed.message: Blankets are allowed!
Soft-sided coolers, no larger than a 12-pack size, are allowed!
Regular sized or unframed backpacks are allowed!
Two factory-sealed water bottles, up to 1 liter each, are allowed!
Empty Camelbaks or other empty plastic containers, i.e. Nalgene bottles, Klean Kanteens are allowed!
Ice contained in a softÂ­-sided cooler or Camelbak - no large bags allowed
Binoculars are allowed!
Personal cameras with a detachable lens 2 inches or shorter are allowed.

Totems are allowed, but they must be no taller than 6ft and no thicker than 1/2 inch. Must be made of light material: swim noodles foam type material cardboard tubes fabric string yarn light plastic balloons and/or blow up items. Totems made of wood metal and/or PVC material will NOT be allowed.
Weapons of any kind are NOT prohibited. C'mon.
Illegal substances are not allowed.
Large or framed backpacks are not allowed. Bring a a regular sized one instead.
Alcohol alcohol will be sold at the festival
Glass containers of ANY kind are not allowed.
Cans of ANY kind are prohibited.
Skateboards, scooters, or personal motorized vehicles are not allowed.
Bicycles inside Festival grounds are not allowd. Bike racks are available along JFK from Transverse to Stow Lake and at the bike valet located at Transverse and Overlook.
Strollers are not allowd.
Fireworks and explosives are not allowed.
Instruments and laser pointers are not allowed.
Umbrellas are not allowed.
Selfie sticks are not allowed.
Spray paint and large markers are not allowed.
Picnic baskets are not allowed.
Lawn furniture or any chairs with legs are not allowed.
Large or hard-sided coolers are not allowed. Bring a smaller soft-sided cooler instead.
Tents are not allowed.
Pets are not allowed, except animals that assist people with disabilities. Important to read Service and Support Animal Policy & Procedures.
Video equipment no video recording will be allowed
Professional still camera equipment with a detachable lens longer than 2 inches tripods big zooms or commercial use rigs
Audio recording equipment
No illegal vending is permitted no unauthorized or unlicensed vendors allowed
Drones
